title: Daily Distraction: How to get fit within your four walls

content: Over the weekend, I saw a ton of people on my Twitter timeline talking about Dalgona coffee. If you dont know about this trend, its fine. Dalgona coffee is a frothy and creamy coffee thats made by vigorously whipping coffee, sugar, and a little bit of water.… [+1848 chars]
